front.title: Negotiating IPv6 Encapsulating Security Payload (ESP) Security Association (SA) with Cryptographically Generated Addresses (CGA)

abstract.t: This memo specifies a new approach of Encapsulating Security Payload (ESP) Security Association (SA) negotiation. Because of the existing of the Cryptographically Generated Addresses (CGA) extension header and the key pair in CGA, it is convenient and feasible to negotiate ESP SA under the protection of key pair.
